languages.text: "На нее претендовали мои покровители из кабала Опустошительной бури. Я слышал, они отправили ее на улицы Прорвы постигать, что значит быть друкари. У нее впереди много жестоких уроков страдания".

"She was claimed by my patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. I hear they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering ahead of her."
languages.original_text: "На нее претендовали мои покровители из кабала Опустошительной бури. Я слышал, они отправили ее на улицы Прорвы постигать, что значит быть друкари. У нее впереди много жестоких уроков страдания".

traits.locale_text: "My patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest laid claim to her. From what I've heard, they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering to learn."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "My patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest laid claim to her. From what I've heard, they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering to learn."

traits.locale_text: "She was claimed by my patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. I hear they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering ahead of her."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Elle s'est retrouvée entre les mains de mes mécènes de la Kabale de la Tempête Ravageuse. Il paraît qu'ils l'ont abandonnée dans les rues de l'Abîme pour montrer ce que c'est qu'être une véritable Drukhari. Elle va sans doute y recevoir quelques leçons particulièrement douloureuses. »
languages.original_text: "She was claimed by my patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. I hear they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering ahead of her."

traits.locale_text: « Elle s'est retrouvée entre les mains de mes mécènes de la Kabale de la Tempête Ravageuse. Il paraît qu'ils l'ont abandonnée dans les rues de l'Abîme pour montrer ce que c'est qu'être une véritable Drukhari. Elle va sans doute y recevoir quelques leçons particulièrement douloureuses. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “我来自狂风阴谋团的庇护主把她带走了。我听说，那些人把她带到了裂隙的街道上，教他如何成为黑暗灵族。她还有很多严酷的课程要学，有很多痛苦要尝。”
languages.original_text: "She was claimed by my patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. I hear they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering ahead of her."

traits.locale_text: “我来自狂风阴谋团的庇护主把她带走了。我听说，那些人把她带到了裂隙的街道上，教他如何成为黑暗灵族。她还有很多严酷的课程要学，有很多痛苦要尝。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Sie wurde von meinen Gönnern von der Kabale des plündernden Sturms gefordert. Wie ich höre, haben sie sie auf die Straßen der Kluft geschickt, um sie zu lehren, was es heißt, ein Drukhari zu sein. Ihr stehen viele bittere Lektionen des Leids bevor."
languages.original_text: "She was claimed by my patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. I hear they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering ahead of her."

traits.locale_text: "Sie wurde von meinen Gönnern von der Kabale des plündernden Sturms gefordert. Wie ich höre, haben sie sie auf die Straßen der Kluft geschickt, um sie zu lehren, was es heißt, ein Drukhari zu sein. Ihr stehen viele bittere Lektionen des Leids bevor."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «La reclamaron mis patrones de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora. Me he enterado de que la han soltado por las calles del Abismo para enseñarle lo que es ser un Drukhari. Creo que aprenderá unas cuantas lecciones de sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: "She was claimed by my patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. I hear they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering ahead of her."

traits.locale_text: «La reclamaron mis patrones de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora. Me he enterado de que la han soltado por las calles del Abismo para enseñarle lo que es ser un Drukhari. Creo que aprenderá unas cuantas lecciones de sufrimiento».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「彼女はリーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団のパトロンに引き取られた。デュカーリであるということがどういうことかを思い知らせるために、裂け目の街に送られたと聞いている。彼女は、これから苦しみの中で多くの厳しい教訓を得ることになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "She was claimed by my patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. I hear they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering ahead of her."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女はリーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団のパトロンに引き取られた。デュカーリであるということがどういうことかを思い知らせるために、裂け目の街に送られたと聞いている。彼女は、これから苦しみの中で多くの厳しい教訓を得ることになるだろう」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Onu Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'ndaki müşterilerim aldı. Duyduğuma göre Drukhari olmanın ne demek olduğunu öğrenmesi için Yarık sokaklarına göndermişler. Önünde ızdırap dolu, sayısız zorlu ders var."
languages.original_text: "She was claimed by my patrons from the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. I hear they sent her to the streets of the Chasm to teach her what it means to be a Drukhari. She has many harsh lessons in suffering ahead of her."

traits.locale_text: "Onu Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'ndaki müşterilerim aldı. Duyduğuma göre Yarık sokaklarına göndermişler ki bir Drukhari olmanın ne demek olduğunu öğrensin. Önünde ızdırap dolu, sayısız zorlu ders var."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
